directory.name: src
directory.purpose: The `src` directory contains the source code for a React todo application, including components, hooks, types, utilities, and asset files.

subdirectories.name: assets
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The directory `src\assets` stores asset files used by the project.

subdirectories.name: components
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\components` directory houses the React component source code for a todo application, including input, item display, filtering, and statistics functionalities.

subdirectories.name: hooks
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\hooks` directory stores custom React hooks for the project.

subdirectories.name: types
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The directory `src\types` stores type definitions for a software project.

subdirectories.name: utils
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\utils` directory contains utility functions and resources used by the project.
